titles: The humble petition of us the Parliaments poore souldiers in the army of Ireland whereof many are starved already, and many dead for want of chirurgions,
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 18. 1647"; last two numbers of imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
